actions.command: execute if entity @p[distance=..8,sort=nearest,limit=1,nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:5b}]}] run effect give @s minecraft:strength 15 0 true
execute if entity @p[distance=..8,sort=nearest,limit=1,nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:1b}]}] run effect give @s minecraft:speed 15 0 true
execute if entity @p[distance=..8,sort=nearest,limit=1,nbt={ActiveEffects:[{Id:11b}]}] run effect give @s minecraft:resistance 15 0 true
